Sec. 30-393. Same—Illegal sale; issuance, transfer, etc.
It shall be unlawful for any person to sell, purchase, barter, exchange, deal or traffic in motor vehicle inspection certificates, or to issue a motor vehicle inspection certificate except for immediate attachment to a windshield of a motor vehicle which has been tested, inspected and approved for the issuance of a motor vehicle inspection certificate as provided in this article.
It shall be unlawful to transfer any motor vehicle inspection certificate from the vehicle for which it was issued to any other motor vehicle.
